title.value: Classification of the type of trailed hay-bailers for the preparation of scatter hay
Классификация типажа прицепов-подборщиков для заготовки рассыпного сена

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Piunovskij, I.I., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Agriculture Mechanization
Sidorchuk, S.S., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: We have examined regularities of the dependence of technical-technological parameters of trailed hay-balers on the volume of trunk, weight of machine and productivity per one hour of the main time of work. We have obtained analytical dependences and determined the volume of work, made by trailed hay-balers during agro-technical term of preparation of scatter hay, taking into account natural and organizational conditions of the farm. Results of research can be used for the projecting of new machines of the same purpose and for determination of the required number of trailed hay-balers for the concrete conditions of the farm.
